name: Solastalgia (William_Hepton)
description:
You play as a plant who needs to reach their garden with a bucket of water to stop the incoming heatwave.

Team four submission for: The Spell Circle's game jam 25/07/2022

Made by:

Astral - Scripting, Game Design, Ideas

Deschy - Ideas

Joe - Modeling, UI design, Ideas

Zarozer - Modeling, Animating, Game Design, Scripting, Materials
